content.rendered:
Full Lights *(full head of woven high/lowlights)

For guests who want to give their natural hair that special touch with brilliant blonde effects. Luxe place high priority on protecting the hair whilst lightening hair colour and are able to mix 1,2,3or 4 shades to create beautiful multi-tonal effects to the whole head of hair. For more radiance, shine and youthfulness. From 90 minutes. See table below for prices.

Sun kissed (half head highlights)

Our distinctive service for sparkling shimmering effects for cool or warm highlights. From 60 minutes. See table below for prices.

Partial foils

A great introduction to experiencing highlights or just to maintain what you have. From 30-45 minutes. See table below for prices.

Toning

Removes brassiness or unwanted tones also creates softer shades in already coloured hair. From 5-20 minutes. See table below for prices.

Cascade colour (Luxe signature colour)

Enhance the top layers of your hair whilst seamlessly adding slices of colour throughout the hair creating definition and interest to your all over colour. From 60 minutes. See table below for prices

excerpt.rendered: For guests who want to give their natural hair that special effect using techniques such as highlights and toners
